name: Life line (EXOUL)
description:
Life Line (my first entry for a game jam)

This game was created for Extra Credits Game Jam #44.

This short game is about CONNECTING people.

 There are times that we are lonely, sad or unhappy about what is happening to our lives. Just relax ,  keep calm and talk to someone. Trust me ! You will be happy again.

Controls:

*Mouse drag
